name: assessment2_ostad
description: 1. Install NodeJS [Check Node Version node -v] 2. Install NPM [Check NPM Version npm -v] 3. Open the folder through VS Code 4. Open Terminal and run the following commands 5. npm init -y [Initialize the project] 6. npm install cypress -â€“save-dev [Install Cypress] 7. npx  cypress -v [Check Cypress Version] 8. npx cypress verify [Verify Cypress Installation] 9. npx cypress open [Open Cypress to run test in GUI] 10. npm install --save-dev cypress-file-upload 11. npm install --save-dev cypress-mochawesome-reporter [It will download the dependency to generate Mochawesome report] 12. npm install --save-dev cypress-terminal-report [It will download the dependency to print logs on terminal] 13. npx cypress run e2e [Run All Tests with Browser Headless] 14. npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/01-form-submission-validation/form-submission-validation.cy.js  [To run specific suit in headed mode with chrome browser] 15. npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/01-form-submission-validation/form-submission-validation.cy.js, cypress/e2e/02-filter-validation/filter-validation.cy.js  [To run all the suits in this project with chrome browser in headed mode] 16. npx cypress run --browser chrome [Run in Chrome Browser] 17. npx cypress run e2e --headed [Run with Browser Head AND WILL GENERATE HTML REPORT] 18. Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser 19. npx cypress run --record
